name: Aqua-Ducked - Weekly Game Jam #70
description:
I have made a quick update to fix a few bugs.

Instructions on how to play are in the game. 

This is my first attempt at isometric graphics.  I wanted to do a lot more with this but as it is a game jam I ran out of time. I have added 2 buttons to the menu screen to unlock and reset all the levels in case something isn't working correctly.
